question:
A friend who is planning to visit you has asked you to describe the most interesting and enjoyable
things to do in the community where you currently live. Write an email to your friend, telling them
about these things. In your email:
-Say what these things are
-Say why they are interesting/enjoyable
-Suggest what you can do together
text: How are you doing these days? I hope you and your family are doing well. I am really excited to meet you and I am very glad to welcome you to my place.

This city of Los Angeles attracts tourists for its adventure and cinematic universe. There are numerous tours and attractions to visit which help us in gaining  knowledge on how movies are produced with visual effects and graphics. There are some famous rides which will make us feel that we are  part of movies. Moreover, there are studio tours which explain how the famous series are made. For example, Friends and Big bang theory.

In addition to that,  Catalina Island is nearby, which is famous for water sports and also there is a theme park nearby which has the world's best adventure rides. I would suggest that we experience these places together.
